title: Ep. 24 - The Three Things We Can Learn From Christ's Temptation In The Desert
description:
As Christians in modern American society, we are surrounded on all sides by constant and unrelenting temptation. How do we deal with it? Well, Christ underwent his own temptation out in the desert and provided us a model to follow. Let's talk about what we can learn from that story.
